summary: Created ZornFamily.lean with CoherentPartialFamily structure and chain upper bound. Phases 1-2 complete, phases 3-4 partial with 8 sorries. Framework in place but Zorn application and seed consistency need completion.

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented Zorn-based family selection framework with CoherentPartialFamily structure and chain upper bound lemma. Phases 1-2 fully complete. Phases 3-4 partial with 8 sorries requiring 4-axiom propagation and Zorn type alignment.

next_steps: Complete seed consistency with 4-axiom propagation, align Zorn lemma types, implement alternative base family construction
